item.title: Head-to-Head: Should antifascists use violence as a tactic?
item.author: Shaul Rosten,Pietro 'Delekof' Salvi,
item.description: The use of violence by antifascist groups in the US is preventing healthy democratic activism SHAUL ROSTEN On August 12th, a ‘Unite the Right’ march was held in the town of Charlottesville, Virginia. It was organised by a White Nationalist to protest the planned removal of a statue of American …
